description:
Located in Dowagiac, Michigan, the May Oberfell Lorber law firm has become one of our region's leading full-service legal practices for individuals, families, business owners and others who have complex, pressing legal issues involving any of the following:

  • Estate planning and elder law
  • Wills and trusts
  • Estate administration and probate
  • Family law and divorce
  • Labor and employment law
  • Insurance defense
  • Personal injury and medical malpractice
  • Banking and finance
  • Corporate and business law
  • Commercial real estate
  • Mediation and arbitration
  • Appeals

Based in Mishawaka, Indiana, our law firm's growth lends credence to the level of success we have achieved helping our clients obtain the favorable outcomes they seek for their legal challenges as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible. When you work with our law firm, you will receive the benefit of working directly with a local attorney who has your best interests at heart.

Our lawyers have more than 160 years of combined legal experience, which means you can expect to receive the highest level of representation for your legal matter. You can rely on us to remain in close contact with you throughout all legal proceedings to address your questions and concerns promptly while offering regular updates as to the status of your case.

Honored for our superior client service, we have received numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients, and our attorneys have earned many top rankings and endorsements from our peers.

To discuss your legal needs with a member of our team, you can contact May Oberfell Lorber by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule a consultation. In these uncertain times, we also offer virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.
